title: AppHub overview
content:
OPTIC AppHub is a web-based management portal for Helm based ITOM applications. From this portal, administrators can drive day one and day two operations such as editing, deploying and upgrading ITOM applications. OPTIC AppHub delivers a common user experience for the entire ITOM portfolio. Each OPTIC AppHub application is a curated set of Helm charts with additional metadata that's rendered and managed via the portal.

  • The Applications page provides you with at a glance application releases that you can deploy in your containerized environment. It starts the configuration process through a rich UI editor, without requiring administrators to use a CLI based console.
  • The Deployments page provides application owners the ability to manage the application deployment lifecycle including the ability to edit, upgrade, and rollback ITOM applications.
